SA20bsa030_u:1016: śarīrāmevotsṛjato na duḥkhyate yadā manaḥ kā draviṇe 'vare kathā /
SA20bsa030_u:1017: tadasya lokottaramiti yanmudaṃ sa tena tattasya taduttaraṃ punaḥ // MSA_16.59 //
SA20bsa030_u:1019: sarvāstidānena yatheha dhīmān tuṣṭiṃ vrajatyarthijanasya tuṣṭyā // MSA_16.60 //
SA20bsa030_u:1022: suvipulamapi vittaṃ prāpya naivopakāraṃ vigaṇayati tathāthī dāyakāllābhahetoḥ /

SA20bsa030_u:1024: svayamapagataśokā dehinaḥ svastharūpā vipulamapi gṛhītvā bhuñjate yasya vittaṃ /
SA20bsa030_u:1025: pathi paramaphalāḍhyādbhogavṛkṣādyathaiva pravisṛtiratibhogī bodhisattvānna so 'nyaḥ // MSA_16.63 //
SA20bsa030_u:1028: vīryaṃ paraṃ śuklagaṇasya madhye tanniśritastasya yato 'nulābhaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:1029: vīryeṇa sadyaḥ susukho vihāro lokottarā lokagatāṃ ca siddhiḥ // MSA_16.65 //
SA20bsa030_u:1031: vīryeṇa satkāyamatītya muktā vīryeṇa bodhiṃ paramāṃ vibuddhāḥ // MSA_16.66 //
SA20bsa030_u:1033: tattve praviṣṭaṃ parivartakaṃ ca vīryaṃ mahārthaṃ ca niruktamanyat // MSA_16.67 //
SA20bsa030_u:1039: na vīryavān khedaparājito 'sti no vīryavān prāptiparājito 'sti // MSA_16.70 //
SA20bsa030_u:1041: ṣaṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ viniścayaḥ sarvathā jñeyaḥ // MSA_16.71 //
SA20bsa030_u:1051: abandhyaḥ sarvathā caiva jñeyo hyākārabhedataḥ // MSA_16.76 //
SA20bsa030_u:1055: sarve ta evaṃ tasmācca vartma tatsatvapācane // MSA_16.78 //
SA20bsa030_u:1057: bhavaviṣayanimittanirvikalpo bhavati sa satvagaṇasya saṃgṛhītā // MSA_16.79 //
SA20bsa030_u:1074: parīttā mahatī pūjā samānāmānikā ca sā /
SA20bsa030_u:1076: buddheṣu pūjā paramā svacittāt dharmādhimuktyāśayato vibhutvāt /
SA20bsa030_u:1081: prabuddhatatvaṃ vacasābhyupetaṃ kṛpātmakaṃ khedavivarjitaṃ ca // MSA_17.10 //
SA20bsa030_u:1082: satkāralābhaiḥ paricaryayā ca seveta mitraṃ pratipattitaśca /
SA20bsa030_u:1083: dharme tathājñāśaya eva dhīmān mitraṃ pragacchetsamaye nataśca // MSA_17.11 //
SA20bsa030_u:1086: yānatraye kauśalametya buddhyā svasyaiva yānasya yateta siddhau /
SA20bsa030_u:1088: satvānameyānparipācanāya kṣetrasya śuddhasya ca sādhanāya // MSA_17.13 //
SA20bsa030_u:1089: dharmeṣu dāyādaguṇena yukto naivāmiṣeṇa pravesatsa mitram /
SA20bsa030_u:1090: hetoḥ phalāddharmamukhānuyānātseveta mitraṃ bahitaśca dhīmān // MSA_17.14 //
SA20bsa030_u:1092: gatiprayogapraṇidhānataśca kalyāṇamitraṃ hi bhajet dhīmān // MSA_17.15 //
SA20bsa030_u:1097: saukhyārthini duḥkhārte sukhite kliṣṭe ca te pravartante /
SA20bsa030_u:1098: taddeśite ca dharme tattathatāyāṃ ca dhīrāṇām // MSA_17.18 //
SA20bsa030_u:1101: te niścalāśca calāśca kṛpaṇairāsvāditā na ca jñeyāḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:1104: hīnāśayāḥ samānā hīnāste hyanyathā tvadhikāḥ // MSA_17.21 //
SA20bsa030_u:1108: tatpratyayairapi bhṛśairna yāti vikṛtiṃ pramatto 'pi // MSA_17.23 //
SA20bsa030_u:1110: yukto hi bodhisattvo bahuvidhamādīnavaṃ spṛśati // MSA_17.24 //
SA20bsa030_u:1115: ete sarve doṣā maitryādiṣu susthitasya na bhavanti /
SA20bsa030_u:1116: akliṣṭaḥ saṃsāraṃ satvārthaṃ no ca saṃtyajati // MSA_17.27 //
SA20bsa030_u:1124: svabhāvadaṃ dharmamupāśritasya bodhirna dūre jinātmajasya // MSA_17.31 //
SA20bsa030_u:1125: vijñāya saṃsāragataṃ samagraṃ duḥkhātmakaṃ caiva nirātmakaṃ ca /
SA20bsa030_u:1126: nodvegamāyāti na cāpi doṣaiḥ prabādhyate kāruṇiko 'grabuddhiḥ // MSA_17.32 //
SA20bsa030_u:1127: duḥkhātmakaṃ lokamavekṣamāṇo duḥkhāyate vetti ca tadyathāvat /
SA20bsa030_u:1128: tasyābhyupāyaṃ parivarjane ca na khedamāyatyapi vā kṛpāluḥ // MSA_17.33 //
SA20bsa030_u:1129: kṛpā prakṛtyā pratisaṃkhyayā ca pūrvaṃ tadabhyāsavidhānayogāt /
SA20bsa030_u:1130: vipakṣahīnā ca viśuddhilābhāt caturvidheyaṃ karūṇātmakānāṃ // MSA_17.34 //
SA20bsa030_u:1131: na sā kṛpā yā na samā sadā vā nādhyāśayādvā pratipattito vā /
SA20bsa030_u:1132: vairāgyato nānupalambhato vā na bodhisattvo hyakṛpastathā yaḥ // MSA_17.35 //
SA20bsa030_u:1135: mūlaṃ karuṇā na bhaved duṣkaracaryāsahiṣṇutā na bhavet /
SA20bsa030_u:1143: kaḥ kurvīta na karuṇāṃ satveṣu mahākṛpāguṇakareṣu /
SA20bsa030_u:1144: duḥkhe 'pi saukhyamatulaṃ bhavati yadeṣāṃ kṛpājanitaṃ // MSA_17.41 //
SA20bsa030_u:1145: aviṣṭānāṃ kṛpayā na tiṣṭhati manaḥ śame kṛpālūnāṃ /
SA20bsa030_u:1146: kuta eva lokasaukhye svajīvite vā bhavetsnehaḥ // MSA_17.42 //
SA20bsa030_u:1147: sneho na vidyate 'sau yo 'niravadyo na laukiko yaśca /
SA20bsa030_u:1150: uddhartuṃ ya upāyaḥ kathamiva na syātsa niravadyaḥ // MSA_17.44 //
SA20bsa030_u:1152: prāgeva tadanyeṣāṃ kathamiva lokottaro na syāt // MSA_17.45 //
SA20bsa030_u:1154: saṃtrāsayati tadādau spṛṣṭaṃ tvabhinandayati gāḍhaṃ // MSA_17.46 //
SA20bsa030_u:1155: kimataḥ paramāścaryaṃ yad duḥkhaṃ saukhyamabhibhavati sarva /
SA20bsa030_u:1156: kṛpayā janitaṃ laukyaṃ yena vimukto api kṛtārthaḥ // MSA_17.47 //
SA20bsa030_u:1157: kṛpayā sahitaṃ dānaṃ yaddānasukhaṃ karoti dhīrāṇāṃ /
SA20bsa030_u:1159: duḥkhamayaṃ saṃsāraṃ yatkṛpayā na tyajati satvārthaṃ /
SA20bsa030_u:1163: vardhe ca vardhayāmi ca dāne paripācayāmi sukhayāmi /
SA20bsa030_u:1164: ākarṣāmi nayāmi ca karuṇā sannānpravadatīva // MSA_17.51 //
SA20bsa030_u:1165: duḥkhe duḥkhī kṛpayā sukhānyanādhāya kena sukhitaḥ syāt /
SA20bsa030_u:1167: svaṃ dānaṃ kārūṇikaḥ śāstīva sadaiva niḥsvasukhakāmaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:1168: bhogaiḥ sukhaya paraṃ vā māmapyayutasaukhyam // MSA_17.53 //
SA20bsa030_u:1169: saphalaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ tanme satveṣu tatsukhasukhena /
SA20bsa030_u:1170: phala teṣveva nikāmaṃ yadi me kartavyatā te 'sti // MSA_17.54 //
SA20bsa030_u:1172: na hi tatsukhaṃ mataṃ me dāne pāraṃparo 'smi yataḥ // MSA_17.55 //
SA20bsa030_u:1174: nanu te tena jñeyaṃ na matphalenārthitā 'syeti // MSA_17.56 //
SA20bsa030_u:1175: dānābhirato na syāṃ prāptaṃ cettatphalaṃ na visṛjeyaṃ /
SA20bsa030_u:1176: kṣaṇamapi dānena vinā dānābhirato bhavati naiva // MSA_17.57 //
SA20bsa030_u:1177: akṛtaṃ na phalasi yasmātpratikārāpekṣayā na me tulyaṃ /
SA20bsa030_u:1178: pratikāranirvyapekṣaḥ paratra phalado 'sya kāmaṃ te // MSA_17.58 //
SA20bsa030_u:1179: niravadyaṃ śuddhapadaṃ hitāvahaṃ caiva sānurakṣaṃ ca /
SA20bsa030_u:1181: sakalaṃ vipulaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ satataṃ muditaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ śuddhaṃ /
SA20bsa030_u:1183: na tathopabhogatuṣṭiṃ labhate bhogī yathā parityāgāt /
SA20bsa030_u:1199: lajjā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena /
SA20bsa030_u:1204: hīnāśayā samānā hīnā hi tadanyathā tvadhikā // MSA_18.3 //

SA20bsa030_u:1213: ete sarve doṣā himatsu bhavanti no jinasuteṣu /
SA20bsa030_u:1214: deveṣu ca manujeṣu ca nityaṃ saṃjāyate ca budhaḥ // MSA_18.8 //

SA20bsa030_u:1234: kṛtyeṣu tasmādvijñeyā dhṛtisaṃjñā nije traye // MSA_18.18 //
SA20bsa030_u:1235: prakṛtyā praṇidhāne ca nirapekṣatva eva ca /
SA20bsa030_u:1238: duṣkareṣu vicitreṣu saṃsārātyāga eva ca // MSA_18.20 //
SA20bsa030_u:1240: asamā ca tadanyebhyaḥ so 'gre dhṛtimatāṃ yataḥ[mataḥ] // MSA_18.21 //
SA20bsa030_u:1250: gṛhītā satvapākāya saddharmasya ca dhāraṇe // MSA_18.26 //
SA20bsa030_u:1252: lokajñatā hi dhīrāṇāṃ tadanyebhyo viśiṣyate // MSA_18.27 //
SA20bsa030_u:1257: śamāya prāptaye teṣāṃ dhīmān satyeṣu yujyate /

SA20bsa030_u:1260: prāmāṇikaśca nītārtho nirjalpā prāptirasya ca // MSA_18.31 //
SA20bsa030_u:1262: sābhilāṣa[pa]sya ca prāpteḥ pratiṣedho 'tra deśitaḥ // MSA_18.32 //
SA20bsa030_u:1264: nirjalpādapi ca jñānādapraṇāśo hi dhīmatāṃ // MSA_18.33 //
SA20bsa030_u:1266: paryāye lakṣaṇe vākye jñāne jñānācca tā matāḥ // MSA_18.34 //
SA20bsa030_u:1267: deśanāyāṃ prayuktasya yasya yena ca deśanā /

SA20bsa030_u:1277: saṃtatyā bhāvanāmetya bhūyo bhūyaḥ śubhasya hi /
SA20bsa030_u:1278: āhāro yaḥ sa saṃbhāro vī[dhī]re sarvārthasādhakaḥ // MSA_18.40 //
SA20bsa030_u:1290: manaskārasya ca tyāge praveśe caiva bhūmiṣu // MSA_18.46 //
SA20bsa030_u:1292: satvānāṃ paripāke ca abhiṣeke ca dhīmatāṃ // MSA_18.47 //
SA20bsa030_u:1293: kṣetrasya ca viśuddhyarthaṃ niṣṭhāgamana eva ca /
SA20bsa030_u:1298: sarvārthasiddhau jāyante ātmanaśca parasya ca // MSA_18.50 //
SA20bsa030_u:1317: dharmālokavivṛddhyā ca prītyā āpūryate dhruvam // MSA_18.59 //
SA20bsa030_u:1333: prativedhe ca niryāṇe animitte hyasaṃskṛte // MSA_18.67 //
SA20bsa030_u:1335: sarvabhūmigatā dhīre sa yogaḥ sarvasādhakaḥ // MSA_18.68 //
SA20bsa030_u:1337: kṣipraprāptau kriyāśuddhau vartmācchede ca kauśalaṃ // MSA_18.69 //
SA20bsa030_u:1341: parīttā mahatī sā ca mahatī trividhā punaḥ // MSA_18.71 //
SA20bsa030_u:1345: prakāśayanti saddharmaṃ nityaṃ saṃdhārayanti ca // MSA_18.73 //
SA20bsa030_u:1346: cetanā chandasahitā jñānena preritā ca tat /
SA20bsa030_u:1348: hetubhūtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ cittātsadyaḥ phalaṃ ca tat /
SA20bsa030_u:1377: śoṣavṛddheḥ prakṛtyā ca calatvād vṛddhihānitaḥ // MSA_18.89 //
SA20bsa030_u:1382: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /
SA20bsa030_u:1390: dvaye sati ca vijñānasaṃbhavātpratyayo na saḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:1391: nairarthakyādato draṣṭā yāvanmoktā na yujyate // MSA_18.96 //
SA20bsa030_u:1393: tatkarmalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyaṃ saṃbodho bādhyate tridhā // MSA_18.97 //
SA20bsa030_u:1397: darśanādiṣu yatnasya svayaṃbhūtvaṃ na yujyate // MSA_18.99 //
SA20bsa030_u:1401: ātmopalambhe doṣaśca deśito yata eva ca // MSA_18.101 //
SA20bsa030_u:1405: ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ na mokṣaḥ pudgalo 'sti vā // MSA_18.103 //
SA20bsa030_u:1406: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /
SA20bsa030_u:1421: ātmopalambhe doṣaśca deśito yata eva ca //
SA20bsa030_u:1431: ātmārthaṃ ca na riñcanti parārthaṃ sādhayanti ca // MSA_18.104 //
SA20bsa030_u:1437: durbaleṣu kṣamā kāye jīvite nirapekṣiṇaḥ // MSA_19.1 //
SA20bsa030_u:1438: vīryārambho hyanāsvādo dhāneṣu sukha eva ca /
SA20bsa030_u:1439: niṣkalpanā na prajñāyāmāścaryaṃ dhīmatāṃ ga[ma]taṃ // MSA_19.2 //
SA20bsa030_u:1443: tathaiva samacittatvaṃ nāścaryaṃ tāsu yuktatā // MSA_19.4 //
SA20bsa030_u:1445: satvānāṃ pragataḥ sneho yathā satveṣu dhīmatāṃ // MSA_19.5 //
SA20bsa030_u:1448: dhyānaṃ ca kuśalaṃ nityaṃ prajñā caivāvikalpikā /
SA20bsa030_u:1450: sthāpanā bhājanatve ca śīleṣveva ca ropaṇaṃ /
SA20bsa030_u:1462: anarhadeśanāṃ ye ca satvānāṃ gūhayanti hi /
SA20bsa030_u:1463: śikṣāvipattiṃ nindanti śaṃsantyeva ca saṃpadam // MSA_19.14 //
SA20bsa030_u:1467: yacchanti laukikīṃ kṛtsnāṃ saṃpadaṃ cātilaukikīm // MSA_19.16 //
SA20bsa030_u:1468: sukhe hite cābhinnā[akheditvādabhinnā] ye sadā sukhahitaiṣiṇaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:1482: asaktyā caiva bhogeṣu śīlasya ca na khaṇḍanaiḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:1486: vṛddhiṃ hāniṃ ca kāṅkṣanti satvānāṃ ca prapācanaṃ /
SA20bsa030_u:1487: viśeṣagamanaṃ bhūmau bodhiṃ cānuttarāṃ sadā // MSA_19.26 //
SA20bsa030_u:1491: śīlaṃ kṣāntiśca sarvatra vīryaṃ sarvaśubhodaye // MSA_19.28 //
SA20bsa030_u:1499: lobhatvena tatha vṛttiḥ śāntavākkāyatā tathā // MSA_19.32 //
SA20bsa030_u:1504: ṣaṭprakāraṃ vipakṣaṃ hi dhīmantaḥ sarvabhūmiṣu // MSA_19.34 //
SA20bsa030_u:1509: kṣetreṇaṃ nāmnā kālena kalpanāmnā ca tatpunaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:1518: duḥkhādhivāsanā caiva kuśalasya ca bhāvanā // MSA_19.40 //
SA20bsa030_u:1523: prajñā pāramitānāṃ ca pradhānaṃ dhīmatāṃ matam // MSA_19.42 //
SA20bsa030_u:1527: caturdhā ca tridhā caiva yuktiyānavyavasthitiḥ // MSA_19.44 //
SA20bsa030_u:1538: purataḥ sthāpitaṃ yacca nimittaṃ yatsthitaṃ svayaṃ /
SA20bsa030_u:1545: tattvaṃ tu bodhisatvānāṃ sarvataḥ khyātyapāsya tat // MSA_19.53 //
SA20bsa030_u:1550: paripācyaṃ viśodhyaṃ ca prāpyaṃ yogyaṃ ca pācane /
SA20bsa030_u:1553: cakṣuśca nirmalaṃ hīnamāśravakṣaya eva ca // MSA_19.57 //
SA20bsa030_u:1555: deśanāyāḥ phalaṃ jñeyaṃ tatprayuktasya dhīmataḥ // MSA_19.58 //
SA20bsa030_u:1557: jñānasya vīryārambhasya upāye kauśalasya ca // MSA_19.59 //
SA20bsa030_u:1563: apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ bodhiḥ śreṣṭhā ca darśanāt[darśanā] // MSA_19.62 //
SA20bsa030_u:1566: bodhisatvā hi vijñeyāḥ pañcaite sarvabhūmiṣu // MSA_19.63 //
SA20bsa030_u:1570: dhīro 'pramattaśca bahuśrutaśca parārthayuktaḥ khalu bodhisattvaḥ // MSA_19.65 //
SA20bsa030_u:1572: yogī nimitte kuśalo 'kudṛṣṭiradhyātmasaṃsthaḥ khalu bodhisattvaḥ // MSA_19.66 //
SA20bsa030_u:1574: smṛtipradhānaḥ susamāhitātmā yānāvikāryaḥ khalu bodhisattvaḥ // MSA_19.67 //
SA20bsa030_u:1575: duḥkhāpaho duḥkhakaro na caiva duḥkhādhivāso na ca duḥkhabhītaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:1576: duḥkhādvimukto na ca duḥkhakalpo duḥkhābhyupetaḥ khalu bodhisattvaḥ // MSA_19.68 //
SA20bsa030_u:1578: dharme vaśī dharmanirandhakāro dharmapradhānaḥ khalu bodhisattvaḥ // MSA_19.69 //
SA20bsa030_u:1580: sukhāpramatto dharamāpramatto yānāpramatto khalu bodhisattvaḥ // MSA_19.70 //
SA20bsa030_u:1584: śamopa[samaupa]deśena mahāphalena anugrahe vartati bodhisattvaḥ // MSA_19.72 //
SA20bsa030_u:1590: upāyabodhaiśca viśeṣaṇena tenocyate hetuna bodhisatvaḥ // MSA_19.75 //
SA20bsa030_u:1598: bodhādbhṛśaṃ saṃśayahānibodhāt tenocyate hetuna bodhisattvaḥ // MSA_19.79 //
SA20bsa030_u:1610: prakurvanti hi satvārthaṃ gṛhiṇaḥ sarvajanmasu // MSA_20.3 //

SA20bsa030_u:1627: vinā ca cittasaṃkleśaṃ satvānāṃ paripācanā // MSA_20.11 //
SA20bsa030_u:1631: satvapākasya niṣpattirjāyate ca tataḥ param // MSA_20.13 //
SA20bsa030_u:1637: saṃpūrṇakāyaśca nidarśane ca śakto 'bhiṣiktaḥ khalu bodhisatvaḥ // MSA_20.16 //
SA20bsa030_u:1662: nācchando na ca lubdhahrasvahṛdayo na krodhano nālaso nāmaitrīkarūṇāśayo na kumatiḥ kalpairvikalpairhataḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:1663: no vikṣiptamatiḥ sukhairna ca hato duḥkhairna vā [vyā]vartate satyaṃ mitramupāśritaḥ śrutaparaḥ pūjāparaḥ śāstari // MSA_20.29 //
SA20bsa030_u:1664: sarvaṃ puṇyasamuccayaṃ suvipulaṃ kṛtvānyasādhāraṇaṃ saṃbodhau pariṇāmayatyaharaharyo hyuttamopāyavit /
SA20bsa030_u:1665: jātaḥ svāyatane sadā śubhakaraḥ krīḍatyabhijñāguṇaiḥ sarveṣāmuparisthito guṇanidhirjñeyaḥ sa buddhātmanaḥ // MSA_20.30 //
SA20bsa030_u:1669: tīvra utpadyate modo muditā tena kathyate // MSA_20.32 //
SA20bsa030_u:1675: dhīmadbhirjīyate duḥkhaṃ durjayā tena kathyate // MSA_20.35 //
SA20bsa030_u:1685: bhūtāmitābhayārthāya ta eveṣṭā hi bhūmayaḥ // MSA_20.40 //
SA20bsa030_u:1694: jñānena jñeyaṃ vyāptaṃ te muktacitta namo 'stute // MSA_20.44 //
SA20bsa030_u:1698: sadaiva sarvapraśnānāṃ visarjaka namo 'stu te // MSA_20.46 //
SA20bsa030_u:1699: āśraye 'thāśrite deśye vākye jñāne ca deśike /
SA20bsa030_u:1702: niḥ sāre caiva satvānāṃ svavavāda namo 'stu te // MSA_20.48 //
SA20bsa030_u:1708: mahāyāne ca niryāṇe mārabhañja namo 'stu te // MSA_20.51 //
SA20bsa030_u:1712: nirārakṣa asaṃmoṣa gaṇakarṣa namo 'stu te // MSA_20.53 //
SA20bsa030_u:1714: sarvadā tava sarvajña bhūtārthika namo 'stu te // MSA_20.54 //
SA20bsa030_u:1718: mahākaruṇayā yukta hitāśaya namo 'stu te // MSA_20.56 //
SA20bsa030_u:1722: sarvatra sarvasatvānāṃ kāṅkṣāchida namo 'stu te // MSA_20.58 //
SA20bsa030_u:1724: āniṅkṣya sarvadharmeṣu niṣprapañca namo 'stu te // MSA_20.59 //
